title: How to argue in league of legends.  Version 1.0
body: Can be used in all game modes.  follow this handy flowchart to talk trash to your teammates and enemies

replies.body:
It's an infinite loop.

We're fucked.

Not to mention the "Make fun of their rank" box makes you repeat a number of actions twice. Like, how am I going to tell someone to stop feeding so many times without running out of my chat restriction messages.

> [{quoted}](name=0 oxros piratis,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=fdcMj8wx,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-04T19:41:34.283+0000)
>
> Not to mention the "Make fun of their rank" box makes you repeat a number of actions twice. Like, how am I going to tell someone to stop feeding so many times without running out of my chat restriction messages.

If you're chat restricted you've already followed this flowchart without realizing it.  Spread forth the good word my brother

Did you win? -> Report someone


Loool
I love how it doesn't care whether or not you won xD

> [{quoted}](name=Spaceman5pff,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=fdcMj8wx,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-02-03T22:22:58.948+0000)
>
> Did you win? -> Report someone
> 
> 
> Loool

Glad you noticed xD

Fixed it


> Are they lower rank?
> Yes- Make fun of their rank
> No- Make fun of their rank by saying they're boosted

Man, I once got called boosted by Golds.

The best part?
I'm Silver right now.

Some of the arrows are wrong. For example, should one trashtalk be executed it should point into another trashtalk-checker, not directly into another trashtalk.

Yes, it's joke, but your flowchart is so {{champion:202}} beautiful I simply must take it seriously.
There's a huge missing spot for blaming the support.

> [{quoted}](name=DarkRitual,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=fdcMj8wx,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-02-04T14:22:54.164+0000)
>
> There's a huge missing spot for blaming the support.

I wanted to say instead of 'someone else' support, but I felt sometimes others just needed to be blamed and I didn't want to make it unnecessarily cluttered.
I'm following this flow chart and I now win 50% more games.
As a computer science student I must say this chart is atrotious. Use the correct symbols plox and not just use random stuff.

I have a spreadsheet as well.

https://i.gyazo.com/ee288d784e52bbc0abfb90749af1f776.png

the bottom says start game, and leads into "did someone die?"

Too many boxes...
http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/2013/05/didnt-read.gif
So I'll just sum this up:
Toxic Community.

> Version 1.0

so why not fix it before posting it? kind of ruined it even if you do end up doing so
